summary: Five children take shelter from the rain, inside a spooky bungalow. Encountering an old woman, they follow her upstairs where she proceeds to tell them six scary stories.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Arjun Rampal|Anil Kapoor|Mallika Sherawat|Manoj Pahwa|Randeep Hooda|Zakir Hussain|Sunil Shetty|Sonali Kulkarni|Rajpal Yadav|Bipasha Basu|Riteish Deshmukh|Makrand Deshpande|Isha Koppikar|Priyanka Kothari|Ava Mukherjee|Shweta Basu Prasad|Mohit Ahlawat|Rasika Joshi|Sarita Joshi|Sainee Raj|Gopal Singh
director: Directors: J.D. Chakravarthi (as Chekravarthy), Manish Gupta | 5 more credits »
title: Darna Zaroori Hai
